Package part1.mailServicePack

Class MailService

java.lang.Object
part1.mailServicePack.MailService
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, MailServiceInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
MailServiceFactory
public class MailService
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, MailServiceInterface
This class consists exclusively in the Mail Service back-end. It contains a mail box list and different methods to add/remove Mail Boxes or search a user's mailbox. This last method uses streams to filter the multiple users.
See Also:
Serialized Form
